programme.title: Mercury Man
programme.desc: Selepas memberus dirinya dengan bahan pelik, rata-rata anggota bomba berubah menjadi sesuatu yang jauh lebih hebat daripada dirinya seperti Mercury Man. Dikurniakan kuasa besar yang hebat, dia kini akan menggunakan kebolehannya untuk membantu menakluki kuasa jahat.

programme.title: Santau Merasuk Ep8
programme.desc: Halim bersama Nina mengambil Mat di hospital. Nina perasan dirinya diekori satu sosok lembaga. Arifah yang sedang membuat persiapan jamuan kepulangan Mat didatangi Farel dan Echa yang menghantar makanan. Kemudian disusuli oleh Husin yang turut menghantar makanan. Mat yang menyedari isterinya sudah terkena sihir cuba menngubati tetapi gagal. Arifah tetap menafikan setiap tekaan Mat demi mengelak Maya terus berdendam. Arifah meninggal dunia akibat serangan penyakit misteri. Mat tidak dapat menerima kematian Arifah dan terus membawa diri dari situ. Dendam di hati seolah masih tidak terlerai.

programme.title: Mumun
programme.desc: Bertahun-tahun selepas kematian ibunya, seorang wanita yang mengalami kerosakan emosi mencari bapanya yang hilang dan menghadapi masa lalunya.

programme.title: Mantera Anjasmoro Ep10
programme.desc: Episod ini mengisahkan Ustaz Kalam merawat Zahid yang sakit teruk sehingga dia sembuh. Ustaz dapat mengesan apa yang berlaku pada Zahid adalah ilmu sihir permainan ajasmoro. Irfan melamar Sabrina, dia hendak berkahwin dengan Sabrina sekiranya Sabrina memohon diceraikan oleh Zahid. Apabila Sabrina mengadu kepada Ramona, Irfan mati dalam keadaan ngeri akibat disantau oleh Ramona.

programme.title: Amukan Pocong S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Mengisahkan mayat Zai ditemui oleh orang kampung Paya Besar dengan kesan jerutan di leher pada esok paginya. Mayat Zai diuruskan oleh keluarganya. Salah seorang yang hadir adalah sepupu Zai, Sulaiman. Sulaiman terkejut bila melihat kesan kematian Zai seperti pernah dilihatnya 50 tahun dulu iaitu kematian Awang. Long Husin kini menjadi boneka Awang untuk mencari 13 perawan

programme.title: My Spy
programme.desc: AJ (AC Mizal) ialah seorang yang liar dan buta warna. Salleh (Harun Salim Bachik) pula seorang pesara polis yang cuba menjual rekaannya kepada Polis Diraja Malaysia. Kedua-duanya membenci satu sama lain. Namun, penyiasat-penyiasat persendirian ini harus bergabung tenaga untuk menyelesaikan kes terbesar mereka.

programme.title: Dendam Sarakit S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Sarakit dirogol empat lelaki bertopeng sementara seorang lagi, Ramdi, diminta menjaga di luar rumah. Keesokan hari, ibu bapa Sarakit pergi menjenguk Sarakit dan mendapati rumahnya berkunci dan tiada respon dari Sarakit. Mereka terserempak dengan Pak Bado yang mengadu bahawa Sarakit sudah sombong setelah berkahwin dengan Rafiq dan melanggar adat resam kampung. Sarakit yang sangat lemah dan tidak berdaya untuk bangun dan bersuara mendengar perbualan mereka. Sementara itu, Mariam masih enggan membenarkan Rafiq pulang ke Sarakit atas alasan dia sakit dan cuba mendekatkan Rafiq dengan Dina, bekas teman wanitanya. Pada masa yang sama, Ramdi sering diganggu oleh lembaga putih berambut panjang yang setiap malam merayau-rayau di kampung sambil menangis dan memohon maaf. Pada satu malam, Kiol, salah seorang yang merogol Sarakit, dicekik lembaga putih berambut panjang dan mayatnya dijumpai di sungai dengan jari kelingkingnya dipotong.

programme.title: My Spy
programme.desc: AJ (AC Mizal) ialah seorang yang liar dan buta warna. Salleh (Harun Salim Bachik) pula seorang pesara polis yang cuba menjual rekaannya kepada Polis Diraja Malaysia. Kedua-duanya membenci satu sama lain. Namun, penyiasat-penyiasat persendirian ini harus bergabung tenaga untuk menyelesaikan kes terbesar mereka.

programme.title: Mantera Anjasmoro Ep9
programme.desc: Episod ini mengisahkan ibubapa Suria marah selepas mengetahui Suria berkahwin tanpa memohon restu. Ibubapa Zahid pula menasihatkan Zahid supaya jangan menceraikan Sabrina kerana cucu mereka akan dilahirkan. Kini Zahid jarang pulang ke rumah, bomoh Ramona mengingatkan Sabrina menggunakan minyak jampi dengan yakin setiap hari.

programme.title: Felak
programme.desc: Seher, yang kehilangan bapanya pada usia muda, mengalami masalah psikologi. Erhan cintakan Seher sejak kecil, berkahwin dengan Nilay. Seher sangat cemburu dengan Nilay. Seher, yang mengalami gangguan saraf yang berterusan, menjadi kecewa. Nilay dan Erhan berpendapat keadaan Seher ini ada kaitan dengan penyakitnya. Tetapi ada sesuatu yang mereka tidak tahu. Seher telah menggunakan mantra untuk membalas dendam kepada Nilay.

programme.title: Mantera Anjasmoro Ep10
programme.desc: Episod ini mengisahkan Ustaz Kalam merawat Zahid yang sakit teruk sehingga dia sembuh. Ustaz dapat mengesan apa yang berlaku pada Zahid adalah ilmu sihir permainan ajasmoro. Irfan melamar Sabrina, dia hendak berkahwin dengan Sabrina sekiranya Sabrina memohon diceraikan oleh Zahid. Apabila Sabrina mengadu kepada Ramona, Irfan mati dalam keadaan ngeri akibat disantau oleh Ramona.

programme.title: Cloudy Mountain
programme.desc: Apabila terowong berusia sepuluh tahun ditetapkan untuk selesai mengalami pelarasan geologi di seluruh dunia, urutan kegagalan geologi termasuk rekahan lantai, gempa bumi, tanah runtuh, runtuh lumpur dan sebagainya akan datang. Terowong dan seluruh negara dipertaruhkan. Lao Hong dan Xiao Hong, ayah dan anak lelaki itu berdiri dalam keadaan terdesak. Bagaimanakah mereka terselamat daripada krisis hidup-dan-mati ini dengan 160,000 rakyat?

programme.title: Amukan Pocong S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Mengisahkan mayat Zai ditemui oleh orang kampung Paya Besar dengan kesan jerutan di leher pada esok paginya. Mayat Zai diuruskan oleh keluarganya. Salah seorang yang hadir adalah sepupu Zai, Sulaiman. Sulaiman terkejut bila melihat kesan kematian Zai seperti pernah dilihatnya 50 tahun dulu iaitu kematian Awang. Long Husin kini menjadi boneka Awang untuk mencari 13 perawan

programme.title: Karantina
programme.desc: Ia adalah filem seram tentang empat pelajar kolej yang pergi ke kem untuk mengambil gambar untuk membantu pelajaran mereka. Salah seorang daripada mereka tersesat dan bermulalah cerita.

programme.title: Mantera Anjasmoro Ep10
programme.desc: Episod ini mengisahkan Ustaz Kalam merawat Zahid yang sakit teruk sehingga dia sembuh. Ustaz dapat mengesan apa yang berlaku pada Zahid adalah ilmu sihir permainan ajasmoro. Irfan melamar Sabrina, dia hendak berkahwin dengan Sabrina sekiranya Sabrina memohon diceraikan oleh Zahid. Apabila Sabrina mengadu kepada Ramona, Irfan mati dalam keadaan ngeri akibat disantau oleh Ramona.

programme.title: Mumun
programme.desc: Mumun dan Juned adalah pasangan yang saling menyayangi. Walau bagaimanapun, Mumun meninggal dunia dalam satu kemalangan dan Juned sangat kecewa dengannya.

programme.title: My Spy
programme.desc: AJ (AC Mizal) ialah seorang yang liar dan buta warna. Salleh (Harun Salim Bachik) pula seorang pesara polis yang cuba menjual rekaannya kepada Polis Diraja Malaysia. Kedua-duanya membenci satu sama lain. Namun, penyiasat-penyiasat persendirian ini harus bergabung tenaga untuk menyelesaikan kes terbesar mereka.

programme.title: Santau Merasuk Ep9
programme.desc: Dawami yang mempunyai kepakaran dalam dunia perubatan tradisional cuba memulihkan keadaan dan menasihati Halim secara ‘inderect’ tetapi Halim tidak mengacuhkan. … Dawami diserang dengan berbagai ilmu hitam daripada pihak yang tidak menyenanginya tapi dapat dialahkan. Hubungan sulit yang terjalin antara Maya dan Halim seakan dapat dihidu Nina. Maya mahu keluar daripada rumah itu tetapi dihalang oleh Halim untuk beberapa seketika. Echa melihat keintiman antara mereka berdua.

programme.title: Mercury Man
programme.desc: Selepas memberus dirinya dengan bahan pelik, rata-rata anggota bomba berubah menjadi sesuatu yang jauh lebih hebat daripada dirinya seperti Mercury Man. Dikurniakan kuasa besar yang hebat, dia kini akan menggunakan kebolehannya untuk membantu menakluki kuasa jahat.

programme.title: Plan B Ep1
programme.desc: Episod pertama ini mengisahkan Khai dan Airis kedua-dua mereka daripada keluarga kaya mempertaruhkan wang dalam satu perlumbaan haram kereta "drift". Airis memenangi perlumbaan itu dengan imbuhan wang sebanyak RM20 ribu. Khai tidak berpuas hati, kerana Airis yang dikatakan baru dalam aktiviti ini dengan mudah mengalahkannya. Khai meneruskan usahanya untuk berkenalan dengan Airis dengan bantuan rakanya, Que mendapatkan butir peribadi, Airis menerusi laman sosial "FB".

programme.title: Budak Magik Ep15
programme.desc: Johan dan Suraya telah pulang ke Kuala Lumpur. Wan pula menghadiri jemputan kenduri. Imran dan rakan-rakannya merasakan Ahriman akan bertindak untuk mencuri batu permata yang sekian lama diburu oleh mereka. Benar seperti apa yang dirasakan oleh Imran dan rakanrakannya apabila Ahriman merancang untuk memecah masuk ke rumah Wan bagi mendapatkan batu permata tersebut. Imran dan rakanrakannya bercadang untuk mempertahankan rumah Wan dari dicerobohi dengan menggunakan kelebihan kuasa yang mereka ada Ahriman tiba di rumah Wan, namun begitu perancangan Ahriman sedikit tergendala apabila Cikgu Razip datang bertandang ke rumah Wan. Mereka terpaksa menunggu sehingga Cikgu Razip beredar dari rumah itu untuk membuat tindakan. Setelah sekian lama menunggu akhirnya Cikgu Razip beredar dan Ahriman mula hendak memasuki rumah namun gagal kerana gabungan kuasa budak magik

programme.title: UC 3
programme.desc: Kadir adalah seorang lelaki yang menjadi mangsa ilmu hitam ibunya untuk memisahkannya daripada setiap wanita, termasuk isterinya, yang akan terfikir untuk mendekatinya. Tetapi keadaan menjadi terbalik bertentangan dengan jangkaan ibunya.

programme.title: Azura 2012
programme.desc: Azura, seorang gadis remaja yang gigih hadapi cabaran hidup untuk mencapai cita-citanya. Dia tinggal bersama ibu saudaranya setelah kedua ibu bapanya meninggal dunia dalam satu tragedi. Azura kemudiannya menjadi mahasiswa di sebuah universiti swasta dan menjalinkan hubungan mesra dengan Zek, seorang anak hartawan. Walau bagaimanapun, cinta mereka dihalang oleh bapa Zek dan mereka terpaksa melalui pelbagai dugaan.

programme.title: Scoop
programme.desc: Tania, seorang wartawan menjalankan penyiasatan tentang kes pembunuhan rakannya, Johari yang menyiasat skandal syarikat kewangan. Skandal tersebut melibatkan bapa Sheila. Dibantu oleh seorang jurufoto, Norman yang ingin membersihkan namanya kerana sebelum Johari mati dibunuh, terdapat pertengkaran antara mereka berdua. Mereka pun mula menyiasat punca sebenar pembunuhan Johari.

programme.title: Gila - Gila Pengantin
programme.desc: Aliah seorang gadis yang ingin berkahwin tetapi mempunyai satu fobia dimana dia takut untuk bersanding dia atas pelamin setelah apa yang terjadi keatas dirinya semasa dia kecil. Dalam masa yang sama, Johari juga mempunyai masalah yang sama dengan Aliah. Mereka telah bertemu di dalam dunia cyber dan beramah mesra dengan perbualan masing-masing sehingga hari ini. Rupa-rupanya ada kenangan di antara mereka berdua. Namun mereka bakal berkahwin dengan pasangan yang berlainan dari mereka dan kedua-duanya perlu bersanding di atas pelamin ketika majlis perkahwinan.

programme.title: Femina
programme.desc: Perjuangan untuk mendapatkan hak setara antara jantina terutamanya wanita lantang dibicarakan di dalam majalah Femina. Tina, tegas memperjuangkan pendiriannya manakala Anita tidak berapa menyukai cara Tina. Femina telah menjadi satu platform anti-lelaki. Pertemuan Tina bersama Pyan mula mengubah pandangan ekstrem Tina namun perasaan dilema mula menguasai diri apabila dituduh sebagai pembelot wanita.

programme.title: Azura 2012
programme.desc: Azura, seorang gadis remaja yang gigih hadapi cabaran hidup untuk mencapai cita-citanya. Dia tinggal bersama ibu saudaranya setelah kedua ibu bapanya meninggal dunia dalam satu tragedi. Azura kemudiannya menjadi mahasiswa di sebuah universiti swasta dan menjalinkan hubungan mesra dengan Zek, seorang anak hartawan. Walau bagaimanapun, cinta mereka dihalang oleh bapa Zek dan mereka terpaksa melalui pelbagai dugaan.

programme.title: XX Ray 2
programme.desc: Bekerja sebagai saintis kadet, Tina berasa ditipu apabila Johan mendakwa dia yang mencipta mesin pelupusan laser walhal ia merupakan hasil cetusan idea dari Tina. Ingin menghalang niat jahat Johan, Tina meminta bantuan Amir. Namun, keduanya terkena pancaran laser mesin itu dalam cubaan untuk menghalang Johan dan telah dihantar ke zaman Kesultanan Melayu Melaka.

programme.title: Puteri Impian
programme.desc: Pekerja kilang, Puteri Nora sentiasa mengimpikan untuk menjadi seorang puteri raja. Impiannya menjadi kenyataan apabila dia diterima menyertai pertandingan "Memburu Impian". Kehidupannya berubah sekelip mata apabila bertemu Tengku Faizal, seorang putera raja. Namun, Zul, jurukameranya dalam rancangan itu turut menyukai Puteri Nora. Pilihan harus dibuat antara kemewahan atau kebebasan.

programme.title: Jengka
programme.desc: Nini mengalami keguguran semasa melarikan diri di ladang kelapa sawit. Namun, satu perkara aneh terjadi apabila bayinya dikatakan masih hidup dan dilarikan oleh penunggu. Orang kampung berusaha membantu mencari Nini dan anaknya, namun perkara seram terjadi sepanjang pencarian mereka.

programme.title: Femina
programme.desc: Perjuangan untuk mendapatkan hak setara antara jantina terutamanya wanita lantang dibicarakan di dalam majalah Femina. Tina, tegas memperjuangkan pendiriannya manakala Anita tidak berapa menyukai cara Tina. Femina telah menjadi satu platform anti-lelaki. Pertemuan Tina bersama Pyan mula mengubah pandangan ekstrem Tina namun perasaan dilema mula menguasai diri apabila dituduh sebagai pembelot wanita.

programme.title: XX Ray 2
programme.desc: Bekerja sebagai saintis kadet, Tina berasa ditipu apabila Johan mendakwa dia yang mencipta mesin pelupusan laser walhal ia merupakan hasil cetusan idea dari Tina. Ingin menghalang niat jahat Johan, Tina meminta bantuan Amir. Namun, keduanya terkena pancaran laser mesin itu dalam cubaan untuk menghalang Johan dan telah dihantar ke zaman Kesultanan Melayu Melaka.

programme.title: Gila - Gila Pengantin
programme.desc: Aliah seorang gadis yang ingin berkahwin tetapi mempunyai satu fobia dimana dia takut untuk bersanding dia atas pelamin setelah apa yang terjadi keatas dirinya semasa dia kecil. Dalam masa yang sama, Johari juga mempunyai masalah yang sama dengan Aliah. Mereka telah bertemu di dalam dunia cyber dan beramah mesra dengan perbualan masing-masing sehingga hari ini. Rupa-rupanya ada kenangan di antara mereka berdua. Namun mereka bakal berkahwin dengan pasangan yang berlainan dari mereka dan kedua-duanya perlu bersanding di atas pelamin ketika majlis perkahwinan.

programme.title: Puteri Impian 2
programme.desc: Gadis kilang yang menolak lamaran seorang kerabat diraja Tengku Faizal, menaruh hati terhadap jurukamera stesen televisyen, Zul. Nora menyukai Zul tetapi dia telah pun menjalin hubungan bersama Lisa. Adik kepada Tengku Faizal, Tengku Farid ingin membawa semula Nora kembali ke abangnya. Tekad, dia ingin mengangkat semula maruah abangnya.

programme.title: Scoop
programme.desc: Tania, seorang wartawan menjalankan penyiasatan tentang kes pembunuhan rakannya, Johari yang menyiasat skandal syarikat kewangan. Skandal tersebut melibatkan bapa Sheila. Dibantu oleh seorang jurufoto, Norman yang ingin membersihkan namanya kerana sebelum Johari mati dibunuh, terdapat pertengkaran antara mereka berdua. Mereka pun mula menyiasat punca sebenar pembunuhan Johari.

programme.title: Bukan Cinta Malaikat
programme.desc: Reyhan, seorang sukarelawan Muslim Care yang berasal dari Bandung jatuh hati kepada gadis Malaysia bernama Dewi sejak dia menyelamatkan Dewi daripada satu insiden ketika mereka berada di Madinah. Walau bagaimanapun, cinta Reyhan itu terhalang apabila Dewi mempunyai kekasih bernama Adam. Dalam masa yang sama, seorang gadis bernama Aliyah pula menaruh hati kepada Reyhan.

programme.title: Puteri Impian
programme.desc: Pekerja kilang, Puteri Nora sentiasa mengimpikan untuk menjadi seorang puteri raja. Impiannya menjadi kenyataan apabila dia diterima menyertai pertandingan "Memburu Impian". Kehidupannya berubah sekelip mata apabila bertemu Tengku Faizal, seorang putera raja. Namun, Zul, jurukameranya dalam rancangan itu turut menyukai Puteri Nora. Pilihan harus dibuat antara kemewahan atau kebebasan.

programme.title: Gila - Gila Pengantin Remaja
programme.desc: Pasangan remaja yang bakal menduduki peperiksaan SPM, Amir dan Mastura berikrar ingin berkahwin selepas tamatnya pengajian di universiti. Namun, Fandi yang juga rakan sekelas Mastura mencemburui percintaan mereka. SPM pun tiba tetapi Mastura terlewat menghadiri ujian Matematik dan berasa amat kecewa kerana menganggap dia telah pun gagal. Kakak Mastura, Anita pula ingin Mastura mencari calon suami yang kaya. Perasaan kecewa mula menyelubungi diri Amir apabila mendapat tahu Mastura ditunangkan dengan Fandi. Mengetahui perihal sebenar mengapa mereka akan dikahwinkan, Amir membawa Mastura lari ke selatan Thailand. Bermulalah kekecohan antara mereka semua dalam sekuel kepada Gila-Gila Pengantin ini.

programme.title: XX Ray
programme.desc: Obsesinya terhadap angkasa lepas telah membuatkan Amir untuk mencipta sebuah topi keledar. Topi keledar ini merupakan penemuan baru apabila ia menggunakan kuasa tahi bintang. Sesiapa sahaja yang memakainya boleh melihat menembusi apa sahaja yang mereka inginkan. Kekacauan berlaku apabila topi itu telah menyebabkan Amir bertukar menjadi halimunan.

programme.title: Baginda
programme.desc: Diwariskan untuk mengurus sebuah kolej swasta di Johor Bahru oleh pakciknya, Azian terpaksa melalui pelbagai cabaran untuk menaikkan semula martabat sekolah yang sudah merudum prestasinya itu. Hampir sahaja putus asa namun sikap dedikasinya untuk mendidik anak bangsa membuatkan Azian ingin terus menjalankan amanah pakciknya.

programme.title: Azura 2012
programme.desc: Azura, seorang gadis remaja yang gigih hadapi cabaran hidup untuk mencapai cita-citanya. Azura kemudiannya menjadi mahasiswa di sebuah universiti swasta dan menjalinkan hubungan mesra dengan Zek, seorang anak hartawan. Walau bagaimanapun, cinta mereka dihalang oleh bapa Zek dan mereka terpaksa melalui pelbagai dugaan.

programme.title: Puteri Impian 2
programme.desc: Gadis kilang yang menolak lamaran seorang kerabat diraja Tengku Faizal, menaruh hati terhadap jurukamera stesen televisyen, Zul. Nora menyukai Zul tetapi dia telah pun menjalin hubungan bersama Lisa. Adik kepada Tengku Faizal, Tengku Farid ingin membawa semula Nora kembali ke abangnya. Tekad, dia ingin mengangkat semula maruah abangnya.

programme.title: Scoop
programme.desc: Tania, seorang wartawan menjalankan penyiasatan tentang kes pembunuhan rakannya, Johari yang menyiasat skandal syarikat kewangan. Skandal tersebut melibatkan bapa Sheila. Dibantu oleh seorang jurufoto, Norman yang ingin membersihkan namanya kerana sebelum Johari mati dibunuh, terdapat pertengkaran antara mereka berdua. Mereka pun mula menyiasat punca sebenar pembunuhan Johari.

programme.title: Gila - Gila Pengantin Remaja
programme.desc: Pasangan remaja yang bakal menduduki peperiksaan SPM, Amir dan Mastura berikrar ingin berkahwin selepas tamatnya pengajian di universiti. Namun, Fandi yang juga rakan sekelas Mastura mencemburui percintaan mereka. SPM pun tiba tetapi Mastura terlewat menghadiri ujian Matematik dan berasa amat kecewa kerana menganggap dia telah pun gagal. Kakak Mastura, Anita pula ingin Mastura mencari calon suami yang kaya. Perasaan kecewa mula menyelubungi diri Amir apabila mendapat tahu Mastura ditunangkan dengan Fandi. Mengetahui perihal sebenar mengapa mereka akan dikahwinkan, Amir membawa Mastura lari ke selatan Thailand. Bermulalah kekecohan antara mereka semua dalam sekuel kepada Gila-Gila Pengantin ini.

programme.title: Mat Kari Mek Tomyam
programme.desc: Wanda seorang gadis kampung yang datang ke Kuala Lumpur untuk bekerja di sebuah Café milik makciknya, telah bertemu dengan seorang jejaka yang gila dengan masakan Kari dan Wanda seorang yang hanya pandai memasak Tom Yam yang akhirnya menjadi satu cinta. Pelbagai dugaan dan telatah mereka berdua yang ditempuh semasa mengenali antara satu sama lain.

programme.title: Merah
programme.desc: Tiga sahabat ini pada asalnya berkiblatkan pada kebenaran dan kesucian, tetapi atas cabaran suratan nasib, mereka berubah mengambil jalan singkat untuk mengubah hidup mereka . Mereka bertiga melakukan satu rompakan nekad untuk membantu nenek salleh yang terlantar di hospital, yang memerlukan wang yang banyak untuk mendapatkan rawatan pakar

programme.title: Time Machine
programme.desc: Sekumpulan pelajar dari bandar pergi meredah hutan dengan bantuan seorang pemburu muda sebagai pemandu pelancong. Kebakaran hutan memaksa mereka melarikan diri untuk menyelamatkan nyawa mereka. Kumpulan itu sesat dan tersandung ke wilayah Myanmar di tengah-tengah peperangan antara tentera Myanmar dan penyamun hutan.

programme.title: Tmo Salam Cinta
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Salan Cinta

programme.title: Ku Tak Percaya Kamu Mati
programme.desc: Seorang budak sekolah rendah bernama Bagong maut selepas menjadi mangsa langgar lari. Kematian Bagong menjerumuskan ibunya ke dalam kemurungan yang mendalam. Tetapi tiba-tiba Bagong kembali dengan keadaan sebenar untuk menjaga ibunya yang sangat tertekan.

programme.title: Misterius

Keluarga Lestari sering didatangi roh-roh yang mengembara. Lestari memanggil orang yang bijak, Pak Gozali. Encik Gozali mendedahkan segala rahsia tentang roh yang mengembara ini.

programme.title: Jiran
programme.desc: seorang lelaki membawa keluarganya berpindah rumah di sebuah taman perumahan . Lelaki tersebut bukan sahaja tidak mengambil tahu hal jirannya malah melarang isteri dan anaknya bergaul dengan mereka

Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. programme.title: Detak Jantung di Detik Yang Berbeda
programme.desc: Jasmine yang menghidap penyakit jantung teruk sembuh dengan bantuan penderma jantung Nindy. Jasmine ingin tahu untuk mengenal pasti siapa yang menyelamatkan nyawanya, dan dia akhirnya mengetahui bahawa Nindy adalah orang yang memberikan kepadanya. Suatu hari, Dion melawat kubur Nindy dan memberitahu dia masih tidak boleh meneruskan kehidupannya dan terlalu trauma untuk menjalinkan hubungan semula. Namun, Jasmine terkilan kerana jantung Nindy berdegup kencang di dalam dirinya. Untuk membalas budi baik Nindy, Jasmine ingin menjaga Dion sebagaimana dia menjaga hatinya.

programme.desc: Golden Memories Asia merupakan acara pencarian bakat untuk menyanyikan lagu-lagu nostalgia atau lagu lama dari tahun 1970-an hingga 2000-an, dihadiri oleh enam negara Asia Tenggara iaitu Brunei Darussalam, Indonesia, Malaysia, Filipina, Singapura, dan Timor Leste. Program ini adalah untuk memupuk kegembiraan dan keseronokan, serta satu bentuk persahabatan antara negara.

programme.title: 1987: When The Day Comes
programme.desc: In 1987, a pro-democracy student activist was captured and tortured to death by the police. The authorities tried to cover up the case, but the ordinary people fight to reveal the truth.

programme.title: Jazzy Misfits
programme.desc: A jazz singer goes on a day trip with her estranged mother in search of her younger sister. The two start to discover a different side to each other as they roam around in Seoul.

programme.title: Broken
programme.desc: Two teenage boys raped and murdered Sang-hyun's daughter. The infuriated father unintensionally killed one of the murderer and became a fugitive himself...

programme.title: Friend: The Great Legacy
programme.desc: Joonsuk recruited Sunghoon, a young guy he met in prison, to help him in the gang. Little did he know Sunghoon was the son of Dongsu, whom he was suspected to kill.

programme.title: The Witch: Part 2. The Other One
programme.desc: A mysterious girl survived a blood raid in a secret lab found herself being tracked down by a group of assassins.

programme.title: Midnight
programme.desc: Kyung-mi with hearing impairment trying to save another girl from a killer becomes the prey herself. As the killer gains trust from the police, a life-threatening chase begins...

programme.title: My Paparotti
programme.desc: A music teacher was asked to train Jang-Ho, a teenage gangster dreamed of being a world-class singer. Yet conflict arises between two local gangs and Jang-ho was forced into a difficult situation.

programme.title: Confidential Assignment 2: International
programme.desc: N. Korea detective returns for another secret mission. Despite having different underlying motives, 3 countries join forces to bring down an international crime organization.

programme.title: Tunnel
programme.desc: While driving home for his daughter's birthday, a man gets trapped in a collapsed tunnel and struggles to survive with just two bottles of water, a birthday cake and a cell phone.

programme.title: The Plan Man
programme.desc: An obsessive-compulsive man who plans out every detail of his life came across with a woman with free spirit.

programme.title: The Tower
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve at an ultra-luxurious building complex, a White Christmas party is held to dazzle its equally high-end tenants and VIP guests. It takes a horrific turn when a fire breaks out.

programme.title: Midnight Runners
programme.desc: Two students from Korean National Police University decide to work together and track down a kidnapping incident.

programme.title: Innocent Witness
programme.desc: A housekeeper is charged with murder. Her attorney is surprised to learn the only witness to the crime is a teenage girl with Asperger's. Will the girl be able to provide a valid statement?

programme.title: Midnight
programme.desc: Kyung-mi with hearing impairment trying to save another girl from a killer becomes the prey herself. As the killer gains trust from the police, a life-threatening chase begins...

programme.title: The Battleship Island
programme.desc: During the colonial rule of Japan, around 400 Koreans are conscripted into slave labor on Hashima Island. As the island’s dark secrets are revealed, the Korean labourers plot to escape.

programme.title: Rv: Resurrected Victims
programme.desc: Surreal cases are reported globally where victims come back to life to avenge the murderer. One day, prosecutor Jin-hong’s dead mother returns home and tries to kill him…

programme.title: Confidential Assignment 2: International
programme.desc: N. Korea detective returns for another secret mission. Despite having different underlying motives, 3 countries join forces to bring down an international crime organization.

programme.title: Memories Of The Sword
programme.desc: 3 warriors pledge to fight against an incompetent king. However, a betrayal occurs leading to the death of one of the warriors. 18 years later, the daughter of the betrayed sets out to get revenge.

programme.title: Friend: The Great Legacy
programme.desc: Joonsuk recruited Sunghoon, a young guy he met in prison, to help him in the gang. Little did he know Sunghoon was the son of Dongsu, whom he was suspected to kill.

programme.title: The House
programme.desc: A young couple moves back to their hometown in hopes of starting a family. But when dark memories from their past begin to surface, strange things begin to happen in their house.

programme.title: I
programme.desc: Ah-Young who grew up in an orphanage becomes the babysitter of Young-Chae, who is raising a 6-month-old child on her own. One day, her child has an accident and she places all the blame on Ah-Young...

programme.title: Actionhero
programme.desc: A college student dreaming to be an action star discovered an admission fraud. He decided to make an action film of him against the corrupted professor.

programme.title: Finding Mr. Destiny
programme.desc: Ji-woo is still hung up on a man she fell in love in her early twenties. Her worried father has no choice but to drag her to Gi-joon, who helps people to locate their long-lost first loves.

programme.title: Search Out
programme.desc: When a social media influencer finds traces of cyberbullying that led to his neighbor's suicide, he teams up with his friend to untangle the mystery behind the deadly game.

programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep668
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep445
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Young Days No Fears(M) Ep3031
programme.desc: The six girls, as good friends, have gone through their difficulties and crises in relationship, at work, and in their marriage together. Despite many challenges in life, they are not afraid. They have got each other’s back.

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep903
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep827828
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep668
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3370
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep46084609
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep10631064
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1809
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker-Monday (M)(repeat) Ep6
programme.desc: iWalker is a TV program which introduce food and attractive places to audience.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2031
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker-Moving Kitchen (M)(repeat) Ep1
programme.desc: Tuesday "iWalker" has been upgraded and changed the name into "iWalker-Moving Kitchen". James and the pretty chef, Rachel will move to different province with the mobile kitchen which costs more than 2 million NTD, and introduce to the audience the unique taste of the province.

programme.title: I'm Livin' It
programme.desc: Once a successful banker, Bowen now spends his nights in a 24-hour fast food joint where he meets a group of homeless people. Together they strive to get themselves out of rock bottom.

programme.title: Monster Hunt
programme.desc: The pregnant queen of the monster realm flees a civil war and lands in human world, near Yung Ning Village. She seeks the help of a wimpy villager to become the surrogate father for her child, Wuba. From the time he was born, little Wuba embarks on a thrilling journey to escape from those who want to capture him at all costs.

programme.title: Hong Kong Family
programme.desc: Eight years ago, the family in a Hakka-walled village was torn apart during a combative winter solstice dinner. Eight years later, their cousin returns home from England and seeks to reunite the family for another winter solstice dinner. While things seem to be falling apart, this dinner may well be an opportunity to mend relations.

programme.title: Lucky Star 2015
programme.desc: When a talent manager meets a guy whose voice resembles the famous comedian Stephen Chow, things starts to stir up in the show biz. "Lucky Star 2015" is a hilarious comedy starring actors from both Hong Kong and Taiwan, including Eric Tsang, Dada Chan and Wong Cho Lam.

programme.title: Project Gutenberg
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police hunts for a counterfeiting gang led by a mastermind known as Painter. The gang is so skillful that it's almost impossible to distinguish between its counterfeit currency and real money. In an effort to find Painter's real identity, the Police recruits artist Lee Man to assist in solving the case.

programme.title: The Narrow Road
programme.desc: Chak, a small cleaning company owner, hits tough times during the pandemic. In need of an assistant, he hires a young single mother Candy, who unexpectedly helps him solve many difficulties at work. While life seems to get back on track, a series of cruel realities happen again, but they still bond together to support each other on the narrow road.

programme.title: A Cool Fish
programme.desc: In this dark-comedy, cop-turned-security guard Ma faces the ultimate challenge when his boss mysteriously disappears and his paralyzed sister makes a morbid deal with the armed bandits who abduct her.

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: The “passion choir pilot program” trains students from three underperforming schools’ choir to participate in an inter-school choral competition. While it seems impossible, a renowned conductor, Yim Tsz Long, unexpectedly agrees to lead the choir. Will the “passion choir” and Maestro Yim complete this impossible mission and win the competition?

programme.title: Manhunt
programme.desc: In this movie directed by John Woo, lawyer Du goes on the run after he is framed for a murder. Veteran detective Yamura suspects the case to be more complicated than it seems, and while he understands Du better during the hunt, Yamura still doubts his innocence. Is the real killer lurking elsewhere? Is there a hidden conspiracy behind the murder?

programme.title: Only Cloud Knows
programme.desc: This romantic drama is based on the story of a real-life couple. It follows a grieving husband as he journeys to places of significance to his beloved dead wife across their New Zealand homeland.

programme.title: Encroach
programme.desc: University freshman Zhen Xin finds her classmates, except You Mei, very unfriendly to her, and the two quickly became good friends. Zhen Xin lives in the dormitory and constantly hears strange noises. When she was attacked by a man in black, You Mei saved her and the latter’s identity is also revealed.

programme.title: You are the One
programme.desc: A talented rogue trader experiences a 180-degree change in life when he encounters a girl who does not believe good things will happen to her. Will they fall in love? It seems like a Cinderella’s adventure has just begun!

programme.title: Blind War
programme.desc: Former SWAT captain Dong Gu suffers traumatic visual loss during a failed mission for which he is forced to take responsibility. He manages to get over and adapt to the situation with his daughter’s company, until his nemesis appears and puts his daughter in danger. Despite being blind, Dong Gu must fight to save his daughter.

programme.title: The Narrow Road
programme.desc: Chak, a small cleaning company owner, hits tough times during the pandemic. In need of an assistant, he hires a young single mother Candy, who unexpectedly helps him solve many difficulties at work. While life seems to get back on track, a series of cruel realities happen again, but they still bond together to support each other on the narrow road.

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: Ting is an undercover police who infiltrates a triad and Tuen is a triad mole being planted into the police force. While Tang is tired of being an undercover cop, Tuen wishes to quit the triad and become a real police. When the triad boss sets a trap to uncover the moles' identity, the two must fight for themselves.

programme.title: My Prince Edward
programme.desc: A newly engaged Hong Kong woman tries to rid herself of a secret sham marriage to a mainlander that she was paid for years ago, before she can get married for real. Winner of Best Original Film Score and Best New Director at the 39th Hong Kong Film Awards.

programme.title: Fierce Cop
programme.desc: To save his son who has been kidnapped by human traffickers, police officer Zhang relentlessly hunts them down and accidentally finds himself implicated in a major child abduction case. In the process, he teams up with a mysterious lady to crack the international crime syndicate and rescue his son.

programme.title: Those Were the Days
programme.desc: Director Wong despises Cantonese movies of the 60s, but accidentally travels back in time to that movie set. He meets Director Chu, who tells him he can return to modern time if someone likes the film he makes. Wong meets four classic movie stars and invites them to star in his new film, but it flops unexpectedly. Can Wong return to the present?

programme.title: Legend of the Demon Cat
programme.desc: Adapted from a Japanese fantasy novel, a demon cat appears and breaks the peace of Chang'an city, causing a series of mysterious events. A poet and a Japanese monk band together to follow the trails left by the cat, leading them to discover a buried secret.

programme.title: Dearest Anita
programme.desc: Based on real events, the movie follows the footsteps of the fans of Hong Kong Canto-pop diva Anita Mui. After the death of the popstar, fans from different walks of life risk arrest to track down handwritten cards, letters and other possessions from Anita Mui to preserve their idol’s memory.

programme.title: The Captain
programme.desc: The movie is based on a real incident of Sichuan Airlines Flight 8633 on 14 May 2018. When the cockpit windshield shatters after takeoff, the Captain manages to land the airplane safely with his level-headed swift actions and sheer determination. This is lauded as a miracle in airline history.

programme.title: The New Big Boss
programme.desc: A young man seeks out the Wolf, a legendary undefeated warrior. When he sees that the Wolf is now an old man, he prompts him to retell his past glories.

programme.title: The Silent War
programme.desc: After the Chinese Civil War, 701 Bureau continues to monitor the coded transmissions between rebel forces. When radio frequencies used by the opponent disappear suddenly, Agent Zhang asks Ho, a blind piano tuner with exceptional hearing, to help find the transmission signals. Can Ho find the missing signals and foil a possible assassination plot?

programme.title: Temporary Family
programme.desc: Hong Kong residential property is reported to be the most expensive in the world. Four young Hong Kong residents, each having their own issues, fall into a property speculation trap and are forced to live together in their new flat.

programme.title: Shaolin vs Evil Dead
programme.desc: Kung fu comedy meets action as the Shaolin monks, Brother White and Brother Black, take on the evil King of the Vampires and his unstoppable army of Darkness.

programme.title: Don't Forget I Love You
programme.desc: Lu Yao suffers from amnesia and forgets about everything that happens yesterday when he wakes up the next day. When Lu Yao meets psychotherapist Xing Yue, they fall in love despite knowing they have no future together, and are determined to love each other no matter what happens...

programme.title: Zhongkui Kill Demon Legend
programme.desc: The Heavenly Master trapped the spirit of the Demon King so as to save the world from evil. Before he dies, the trapped spirit is transferred into Zhong Kui. As a half human and half demon, Zhong Kui is torn between good and evil. Which side will he finally choose?

programme.title: Still Human
programme.desc: Evelyn, a Filipino domestic helper, moves to Hong Kong to work for Cheong Wing, a divorcee paralyzed in a construction accident. Becoming unlikely friends, the two discover shared humanity that helps them face life’s mounting hardships.

programme.title: Enter the Fat Dragon
programme.desc: Donnie Yen plays a Hong Kong police officer who is highly skilled in martial arts but balloons to more than 200 pounds after his fiancé left him. His boss can only assign simple tasks to him like escorting a criminal to Japan, but can he complete it?

programme.title: A Lifetime Treasure
programme.desc: A peaceful home for the elderly is under attack when a gangster and his cronies attempt to set up traps to take over the home! Little did they know that the five elderlies residing in the home have amazing talents to take them head on.

programme.title: The Golden Monk
programme.desc: A monk realizes he is the reincarnation of Golden Child who was cast down from heaven to experience life and death a hundred times, as he broke a sacred rule by falling in love with a fairy, Jade. While his memories are erased, Jade refuses to forget their love and accumulates goodwill over a hundred reincarnations to end Golden Child’s suffering.

programme.title: I Corrupt All Cops
programme.desc: During the time when Hong Kong was under British rule, there was a dark age when corruption and bribery were the order of the day. But in the darkness comes brave individuals who are determined to end corruption with the founding of Hong Kong's anti-corruption bureau in this star-studded crime drama that features Tony Leung Ka Fai, Anthony Wong, Eason Chan and Alex Fong.

programme.title: Bell Chamber
programme.desc: Based on a Thai ghost story of Kuman Thong, the film revolves around a woman who has caused the death of her young brother a long time ago. When she returns to the old house where they lived before, she finds herself haunted by the spirit of her young brother wanting to take revenge for his death.

programme.title: Operation Lipstick
programme.desc: A professor’s assistant stole a micro-film storing the secret of a newly invented nuclear reactor and sells it to a crime syndicate. However, the micro-film accidentally falls into the hands of a nightclub dancer and a thief in the process, leading to them being relentlessly pursued by the crime syndicate to retrieve the micro-film.

programme.title: The Last Tempest
programme.desc: This sequel to The Empress Dowager continues the tale of Emperor Guangxu and Empress Dowager Cixi. Despite Guangxu’s enthronement, his ability to rule effectively is overshadowed by the ever-present power of Cixi. When his attempts to reform the Imperial system are thwarted by the Empress Dowager, Guangxu attempts to curb her power.

programme.title: Martial Club
programme.desc: The young Wong Fei Hung and his friend Wang Yin Lin find themselves and their martial arts schools pitted against another rival school and the expert they hire, Master Shan. This is a masterpiece of Director Liu Chia Liang and one of the top ten movies in 1981.

programme.title: King Drummer
programme.desc: A young musician Chi Chiang is hired by the manager of a popular band when the group's drummer/leader Charlie, quits to join a rival group. The new drummer becomes an immediate hit, causing Charlie to be very jealous. Furthermore, the young drummer's mother is dead set against him having a music career.

programme.title: My Rebellious Son
programme.desc: The venerated Sun Chung made many different kinds of films for Shaw Brothers, including popular and renowned satirical comedies, contemporary action dramas, and magnificent martial arts movies. This is one of his last of the latter for the studio, so he wanted to have fun... and let the audience share it. Toward that end he cast international favorite Alexander Fu Sheng as the title character who keeps testing the patience (and kung-fu skills) of his father, a small town bonesetter and herbal healer played by award-winning character actor Ku Feng. But when a local dignitary not only smuggles drugs but plans to give a Chinese treasure away to evil outsiders, the father and son unite to take on foreign fighters and even Japanese ninja in a non-stop display of comic action prowess.

programme.title: Let's Fall In Love
programme.desc: Da Yung, the son of a rich entrepreneur, meets Lian Lian, the niece of a kindergarten principal by chance. They get into a misunderstanding at the first meeting, causing Da Yung to lose his wallet. Further misunderstanding occurs when he tries to use her to act as his fiancé, in order to drive away two women whom he does not like…

programme.title: The Avenging Eagle
programme.desc: Chik, one of the assassins of the Iron Boat Clan, decides to leave the clan when a kind family saved him. When pursued by the clan, a swordsman whose wife was killed by him saved his life. They decide to jointly take revenge on the clan.

programme.title: Mr. Funnybone Strikes Again
programme.desc: In this hilarious sequel, Mr Big Potato opens an old-fashioned Chinese clinic, but his traditional methods are rejected by the sceptics of modern Hong Kong. Enter his buddy Mr Funny bone to rescue his business!

programme.title: Usurpers Of Emperor's Power
programme.desc: The last ruler of Tang, Li Yao (Chen Chia-chi) is deposed by Chao Kuang-jun (Wang Jung), the founder of the Sung Dynasty. Unfortunately his actions unleash a new plague - his brother Kuang-yi (Chao Kuo) - on the courts and his people. The marauding Kuang-yi rapes and plunders. As more people get involved, it turns into a bloody battlefield of betrayal. It is up to upright officials like Li Lang (Liu Yung) to put an end to it. But can one man take on the imperial army?

programme.title: The Millionaire Chase
programme.desc: It's a fun and wild romp that mixes pleasure with pleasure. A nightclub owner, playboy Peter Chen Ho, has his ways with three sisters while gallivanting across Asia. Each one has a dangling relationship to save - ensuring a series of mishaps and comic moments.

programme.title: The Silent Swordsman
programme.desc: This is adapted from Louis Cha’s “The Book and the Sword”. A young swordsman is tasked to lead a patriotic secret society to fight the traitorous general who colludes with the enemy. At the same time, he encounters a female warrior and two beautiful princesses, and is caught between all their affections for him.

programme.title: Martial Arts of Shaolin
programme.desc: Zhi Ming, who trains at the Northern Shaolin Temple, teams up with Si Ma Yan, who trains at the Southern Shaolin Temple, to avenge both their fathers’ death by assassinating a corrupt magistrate, leading to a series of fierce battles!

programme.title: The Sword Stained with Royal Blood
programme.desc: Adapted from the novel by Jin Yong, havoc breaks out when a warrior on the run uncovers a sword, training manual, treasure map & a secret message on the body of a deceased martial arts master.

programme.title: Whose Baby is in the Classroom?
programme.desc: Chen, a male teacher in an all girls’ high school, is stuck with a baby that isn’t his and must take care of it. As he lives on the school grounds, the baby is a source of constant distraction and worry! Luckily, his class warms to the baby and helps him take care of it while he works his charm on Li Ching, an uptight teacher in the same school.

programme.title: Notorious Eight
programme.desc: The young Chen Chi-chin (Liu Yung) loses heavily to experienced gambler Hu Kuan-ten (Lo Lieh). His father loses at cards and dies of shock. Chen appeals to his uncle who summons seven fellow professional gamblers to carry out vengeance. Much more than a gambling film, this is a thrilling melting pot of martial arts stars, extortion, illicit love, poker-face vengeance, and all sorts of edge-of-your-seat gambling duels. Featuring two of the leading action stars of the era, Chen Kuen-tai and Lo Lieh, in a series of intense poker game standoffs. Famed director of the genre, Wong Jing, also has a guest appearance as one of the Notorious Eight.

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Zhang and Jin’s daughter, Peony, are betrothed at birth but Jin objects to the engagement now. Zhang meets a carp spirit that looks exactly like Peony and they fall in love. When Justice Bao is asked by Jin to distinguish Peony from her replica, he decides to quit the case when he witness the true love between Zhang and the carp spirit.

programme.title: Cat VS Rat
programme.desc: Jien Chiu and Bai Yu Tong are equally matched rivals in martial arts. Bai saves the emperor one day but did not believe his identity. Jien rescues the emperor later and gets promoted to the royal guard. This angers Bai and he attempts to jeopardize Jien’s position by stealing the imperial jade seal. Luckily, Jien is able to reclaim the seal with his skills.

programme.title: Mr Funny - bone
programme.desc: Join Mr Funny bone in a series of comic vignettes as he attempts to win the heart of a dashing lady. Along for the ride is his loyal sidekick Mr Big Potato, a stout fellow who is forever getting into silly mishaps. The pair gets involved in plenty of shenanigans and gags!

programme.title: Ode to Gallantry
programme.desc: In this surprisingly light-hearted "Venoms" martial arts adventure, a lone wanderer is repeatedly mistaken for someone else and drawn into a number of violent battles.

programme.title: Passing Flickers
programme.desc: This film is an amusing insider’s look at the Hong Kong film industry and is based on Director Li Han Hsiang’s popular newspaper column recounting his work at Shaw Brothers. The collection of some of his funniest and most surreal film musings of the era, filled with behind-the-scene asides, this is a must-see for any Hong Kong cinema aficionado!

programme.title: Holy Flame of the Martial World
programme.desc: This internationally popular tale of a brother and sister, seeking vengeance for the death of their parents through using the mythical yin/yang Holy Flame kung-fu technique. It's an outstanding epic choreographed and co-starring lead "Venom" Kuo Chue (aka. Philip Kwok).

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: To the tune of the Osmonds hit song, this is a story of adolescent playfulness & innocence lost. Two best friends grow up together and teasingly meet two delightfully impish boys leading to the four to flirtatiously intermingle. However, the innocence of partner swapping eventually leads to a roller-coaster bouts of misunderstood emotions.

programme.title: The Lady Professional
programme.desc: Lily Ho is perfectly cast as a gun-for-hire who always gets her man - in more ways than one! The cast and crew shot on location in Japanese scenic spots such as Mount Fuji; and there are plenty of over-the-top thrills, as Lily even masquerades as a nun.

programme.title: Blue Skies
programme.desc: A young singer Hsiao Yun becomes an overnight sensation after standing in for another singer at the eleventh hour. Her success comes at a heavy price however, when her love with a pianist suffers. On top of this, Hsiao Yun must also deal with the unwanted affections from an influential backer of her show.

programme.title: Vengeance
programme.desc: Yu Lou is betrayed by his wife, and eventually killed by her lover, Fung, who is the boss of a martial arts school. Yu Lou’s brother Xiao Lou knows about his tragic death and is determined to take revenge on Fung and his sister-in-law.

programme.title: The Blue and the Black Part 2
programme.desc: Continuing from the first movie, Tang Qi ends her career as a nightclub singer and starts searching battle-scarred China for her lover Chang, who is now entangled with Japanese invaders, communist insurgents, and a warlord's beautiful daughter.

programme.title: The Savage Five
programme.desc: A group of bandits flees with a stolen safe to a village where they oppress the villagers and force the blacksmith Wei to unlock the safe. Wei refuses and flees to report to officials, while heroes of the town emerge to fight the bandits.

programme.title: The 5 Billion Dollar Legacy
programme.desc: A crippled billionaire mails a letter to each of his long-lost daughters inviting them to go to Japan, in the hope that he will find a worthy heir to inherit his vast fortune. The sisters finally meet abroad the plane to Japan, and one of them is taken with a man who is going to investigate the death of his lawyer uncle in a mysterious hit-and-run.

programme.title: The Flag of Iron
programme.desc: When super director Chang Cheh found new talent and blood with "The Five Venoms" actors, most of which were trained in the highly acrobatic Chinese opera and well versed with exotic martial arts weapons, this created a new spark for his use of bizarre weapons in his films. The Flag Of Iron is one of 20 movies that he directed featuring the utterly flabbergasting and physically exhausting action bits created by these five dudes. You have the good guys from the righteous clan versus the bad guys from the villainous clan and it's so filled with "don't-blink-or-you-will-miss-something" gags, you will need to watch it over and over again so you can see the things you missed.

programme.title: The Mirror and the Lichee
programme.desc: The curious title in this Huangmei Opera romance refers to the two props that signal a happy beginning between a scholar and a local beauty. The scholar polishes mirrors so as to be closer to his love, who signals her approval by tossing him some lichees. From that point on the course of their love becomes rocky, complete with murder and suicide.

programme.title: Opium And The Kung-Fu Master
programme.desc: Tie Qiao San, head of the Ten Guangdong Tigers, is an honourable master with many disciples. As opium becomes popular among the nobles, Tie starts taking it and gradually harms his body. When an opium house’s owner defeats Tie in a fight and he is only saved from being killed by his disciple, Tie vows to quit opium and get back on his feet.

programme.title: The Shadow Boxing
programme.desc: Chan and his apprentice Fan transport vampires for a living. In their most recent job, they are hired to transport nine zombies at one go. When two of them hopped away, it is revealed that one of them is actually a man in disguise trying to escape from his enemies. It turns out that the fake zombie and Chan are both martial arts experts!

programme.title: Raw Courage
programme.desc: After the Ming Emperor is overthrown and his infant son was put in the care of the Black Dragon Society, a traitorous martial arts clan attacks the society, forcing an inexperienced pair of swordsman and swordswoman to flee with the infant. Their journey to deliver the infant to safety is filled with dangers that would require help from other allies…

programme.title: River of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husband’s death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: House of Traps
programme.desc: It all started with THE FIVE VENOMS, the internationally loved kung-fu thriller which introduced director Chang Cheh's recurring cast of martial arts masters. It continued through more than a dozen high-flying, bloody good entertainments featuring the same action actors in pairs, trios, quartets, and, most memorably, quintets. While this is considered the last official "Venoms" movie, what a film it is. The title does not lie: an evil prince has secreted stolen imperial treasures in a building that practically bristles with booby-trapped blades. Bodies are pierced, limbs are cut off, and there's one plasma-spurting attack after another as heroes and rogues alike try to solve the secrets of the hell house. The core Venoms themselves choreograph the gory fun in this fond farewell to their worldwide film series sensation.

programme.desc: A drama centered on the efforts of John and Aileen Crowley to find a researcher who might have a cure for their two children's rare genetic disorder.

programme.title: The Night We Never Met
programme.desc: Brian doesn't want to give up his bachelor pad so he decides to share his small apartment with Ellen and Sam. The living arragenement works out well until Brian and Sam swap nights without telling Ellen.

programme.title: The Daily Show (S28) Ep90

programme.desc: A man allegedly loses thousands when he tries to get into the house-flipping business. A woman says she can't sleep at night after being blindsided and attacked by large dog on a friend's property.

programme.desc: Alone at Last - Catherine's grief over the loss of Leo during the coup finally catches up with her.

programme.desc: The Girl Who Made the Stars - When a lightning storm in space scares a young Michael Burnham, her father aims to ease her fears with a mythical story about a brave little girl who faced her own fears head on.

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: An Eastern European visitor becomes a resident of a New York airport terminal when a war breaks out, voiding his passport. He makes friends with the airport staff and falls in love with a flight attendant.

programme.desc: The Daily Show correspondents tackle the biggest stories in news, politics and pop culture.

programme.title: Saturday Night Live (S48) Ep15
programme.desc: Live from New York, its Saturday Night Live!

programme.title: Jo Koy: LIghts Out
programme.desc: Jo Koy's star continues to rise in his second feature-length, uncensored stand-up special, Lights Out.

programme.title: The Untouchables
programme.desc: The Untouchables is a must-see masterpiece - glorious, fierce, larger-than-life depiction of the mob warlord who ruled Prohibition-era Chicago and the law enforcer who vowed to bring him down.

programme.title: The Great (S2) Ep4
programme.desc: The Devil's Lunch - The Ottoman Ambassador pays Catherine a visit as tensions between the regions run high. Peter fights to win his allegiance and prove to the court he is more fun than Catherine.

programme.title: Star Trek: Strange New Worlds (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: Spock Amok - It's a comedy of manners when Spock has a personal visit in the middle of Spock and Captain Pike's crucial negotiations with an unusual alien species.

programme.title: 7 Wishes
programme.desc: Marina loses her passport on the eve of her wedding. When she fails to locate it, she takes to her last resort: a wish marathon. She asks the Universe for seven wishes and soon realises that the best blessings come in disguise.

programme.title: H Is For Happiness
programme.desc: In this quirky coming-of-age dramedy, Candice is a twelve year old girl with boundless optimism and happiness. Set in the quirky town of Albany, she sets out to conquer the trials of adolescence and bring love back into her broken family.

programme.title: Love In Bangkok
programme.desc: Architect Laura Brunel is sent to Bangkok to create plans for a mall. She meets Marc, a manager of an NGO that runs orphanages, and falls in love with him. However, she must tell him that her project will involve the destruction of the local orphanage.

programme.title: Golden Men
programme.desc: Based on a true story. A star-studded heist film with a comedic edge, Golden Men follows a group of desperate men in Turin who attempt an armoured truck robbery.

programme.title: A Song For Mia
programme.desc: Sebastian is a young man living a life of wanton indulgence until an accident blinds him and halts his life abruptly. Mia, a nurse unlike his usual women, enters his life and shows him the beauty of a life he can attain if he follows his true passions.

programme.title: The Etruscan Smile
programme.desc: Neil is a rugged and hostile Scotsman who enjoys solitary life. When he’s forced to seek medical treatment in America, he begrudgingly moves in with his son who tries to connect with him. Yet, it is his grandson who ultimately stirs his hardened heart.

programme.title: Kebaya
programme.desc: Ting, a young air stewardess, navigates her new role as a caregiver for her grandmother while building a relationship with her distant father.

programme.title: All My Friends Hate Me
programme.desc: Pete is cautiously excited about reuniting with his college crew for a birthday weekend. But, one by one, his friends slowly turn against him. Is he being punished, is he paranoid, or is he part of some sick joke?

programme.title: Mom Or Dad?
programme.desc: After years of marriage, Valeria and Nicola decide to amicably divorce. However, when both receive lucrative job offers abroad, each tries to avoid having custody of the kids by fashioning themselves as a bad parent. A hilarious war of tricks ensues.

programme.title: The Wedding Misplanner
programme.desc: Two in-laws have clashing ideas on the best wedding arrangement for their engaged children. Claudia, the groom’s mother, wants a small intimate affair while Herb, the bride’s father, wants a pompous ceremony. Peace is shattered, and all hell breaks loose.

programme.desc: A middle-age hunter is found murdered while on a hunting trip. While digging for clues, detectives excavate startling information about his private life. He was a serial seducer and master manipulator with dirty family secrets.

programme.title: Kebaya
programme.desc: Ting, a young air stewardess, navigates her new role as a caregiver for her grandmother while building a relationship with her distant father.

programme.title: Meisie
programme.desc: A young school teacher is posted to a small rural town, where she meets Meisie, a gifted girl who wants to learn but isn’t allowed to. Before she can teach Meisie, the teacher must first convince her father of the benefits and importance of education.

programme.title: All My Friends Hate Me

programme.desc: In a small Baltic town, 18-year-old Christian and his teacher Stella fall for one another and begin a secret affair. However, the intensity of their feelings soon overwhelm them. When tragedy befalls Stella, Christian is forced to confront his first love.

programme.title: Out Of Paradise
programme.desc: Dorj and Suren’s idyllic nomadic life on the Mongolian Steppe is shaken as Suren develops complications in her pregnancy. They embark on a heartwarming journey to the capital, Ulaanbaatar, to seek medical treatment, and overcome challenges along the way.

programme.title: Thou Shalt Not Hate
programme.desc: Simone is an established surgeon and son of a holocaust survivor. After refusing to save a victim of a traffic accident with a swastika tattoo, he must grapple with the guilt he feels from his decision.

programme.title: Love And Other Accidents
programme.desc: Marie is a single mother, saddled with bank debts and running a farm. Philip, manager of the bank, goes to her farm to foreclose it but crashes his car upon arrival. Capitalising on Peter’s resultant amnesia, Marie convinces him that he is her husband.

programme.title: Forever
programme.desc: Childhood friends, Nina and Hugo chose different paths in life. Years later, Hugo returns to his hometown unbeknownst to him, the day before Nina's wedding. Events on the wedding day throw them back together and they embark on a new adventure.

programme.title: A Minute's Silence
programme.desc: In a small Baltic town, 18-year-old Christian and his teacher Stella fall for one another and begin a secret affair. However, the intensity of their feelings soon overwhelm them. When tragedy befalls Stella, Christian is forced to confront his first love.

programme.title: Dr Abel: Decomposed
programme.desc: Inspired by true stories, this thriller covers two grisly crime cases. A young waitress disappears and is held captive by a psychotic doctor. Meanwhile, the head of intelligence of Transnistria defects to the West and leaves a trail of blood behind him.

programme.title: Thou Shalt Not Hate
programme.desc: Simone is an established surgeon and son of a holocaust survivor. After refusing to save a victim of a traffic accident with a swastika tattoo, he must grapple with the guilt he feels from his decision.

programme.title: Kidz
programme.desc: Sara and Nicola are married and in love. Their lives seem to be perfect: they have an angelic six-year-old daughter, thriving careers and a stable marriage. The birth of their second child, which disrupts the family balance, leads to tragicomic scenarios.

programme.title: Love And Other Accidents
programme.desc: Marie is a single mother, saddled with bank debts and running a farm. Philip, manager of the bank, goes to her farm to foreclose it but crashes his car upon arrival. Capitalising on Peter’s resultant amnesia, Marie convinces him that he is her husband.

programme.title: Picket Fences
programme.desc: Kenan, a reclusive Turkish widower, lives beside Lissi, a happy-go-lucky landlady. Both rarely see eye to eye with one another. But when Kenan’s kids embark on a mission to get their father a new woman, things take an unexpected comedic turn.

programme.title: Romancing The Jungle
programme.desc: Eva is a rookie journalist keen on investigating sea piracy. When she is really kidnapped by pirates in Thailand, she is forced to fight for her life. With her is a hunky smuggler called Nik, and together, the comedic duo band together to survive.

programme.title: The Furlough
programme.desc: Four inmates with vastly different convictions are granted a 48 hours furlough. Some seek to redeem failed relationships while others search for vengeance. But above it all, each of them seeks to reclaim their dignity and lust for life once again.

programme.title: Love In Monaco
programme.desc: Mehdi, a 30-year-old man living with his mother in the housing projects, finds himself with a tidy sum of money after winning the lottery. He decides to play high rollers in Monaco with the money, and assumes a new identity as a Moroccan prince.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 3
programme.desc: Posing as a thrift store employee, Michael makes shoppers believe that a real waddling duck is just a lifelike decoy, and confuses clerks with a never-ending chain of hangers. Then, he convinces liquor store customers that some corks are made of cheese and a wine can freeze on command. Plus, in a museum he shocks a gullible new employee by destroying a priceless piece then impossibly reconstructing it.

programme.title: Friends S9 21
programme.desc: Ross is in agony because brilliant, beautiful professor Charlie (AISHA TYLER)-who usually prefers paleontologists-is instead dating shallow Joey.

programme.title: Friends S9 22
programme.desc: Disappointed to learn that they cannot conceive a baby naturally, Monica and Chandler mull their options.

programme.title: Friends S9 23
programme.desc: Chandler accidentally erases the only version of Ross' speech from his laptop computer, Charlie must help Ross reconstruct it.

programme.title: Friends S9 24
programme.desc: despite the fact that it is the first sunny day since their arrival, everyone attends Ross' speech, which is enthusiastically received by his adoring fellow scientists.

programme.title: Gotham S1 17
programme.desc: Gordon & Bullock investigate the Red Hood gang after several robberies. Selina Kyle continues to bond with Barbara; and Fish Mooney tries to reclaim her position in the underworld.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 6
programme.desc: Joe, Murr, Q and Sal call out odd names while working at an office. Later, the guys ask park-goers for help with online dating profiles. And the loser fails to keep cool while getting up close and personal with some strange feet.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 7
programme.desc: Q, Sal, Murr and Joe compete in their first four-way challenge. Later, see what happens when they try to lead a kid's art class and which Loser fails so badly, he's hit with an on-the-spot punishment that leaves him seeing red.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 8
programme.desc: Murr, Sal, Q and Joe climb the corporate ladder as TV execs pitching insane show ideas, and the big loser bares his soul while undergoing a humiliating psychic reading that puts his real life on the wrong track.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 9
programme.desc: Sal, Murr, Q and Joe convince shoppers to repeat bizarre catch phrases, then go mental while psychoanalyzing strangers. Plus, it's an awkward drumroll for tonight's pair of losers when they're forced to perform at a halftime show.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 10
programme.desc: Sal, Q, Joe and Murr are partners in focus group presentations, supporting one another's insane ideas on living life to the fullest. And the loser tries to cure the public of a nasty habit - but gets people smoking mad.

programme.title: Stargirl S3 10
programme.desc: The team regroups after a dramatic confrontation leaves battle lines clearly drawn. A terrifying discovery made by Mike and Jakeem forces Pat and Sylvester to go on high alert.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S12 21
programme.desc: When Barry Kripke finds proof that Dr. Pemberton plagiarized his thesis in college, Sheldon and Amy try to take the high road in their quest for the Nobel Prize.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S12 22
programme.desc: Leonard is pleasantly surprised when his mother (CHRISTINE BARANSKI) visits and is genuinely kind toward him - until he finds out the real reason she's there.

programme.title: Young Sheldon S6 19
programme.desc: For 13-year-old Sheldon Cooper, it isn't easy growing up in East Texas. And while the vulnerable, gifted and somewhat naïve Sheldon deals with the world, his family must find a way to deal with him.

programme.title: Voyagers
programme.desc: A group of 30 young men and women on a long, multi-generational expedition to colonise a distant planet, descend into chaos, reverting to their most primitive state of being..

programme.title: Shoot 'Em Up
programme.desc: Mr. Smith, the angriest, most hardboiled man in the world, finds himself entrusted to protect the most innocent thing of all--a newborn child. When Smith delivers the baby in the middle of a gunfight, he soon discovers that the infant is the target of a shadowy force that has sent a team of mysterious and endless assailants, led by Hertz, to erase all traces of the baby. Amid a hail of bullets and facing every conceivable permutation of gunfight, Smith teams up with a prostitute named DQ to solve the mystery as to why the baby's life is being threatened before this makeshift family all ends up on the wrong side of a bullet. Everyone wants the baby dead. The big question is why?

programme.title: Superman & Lois S3 7
programme.desc: In Season Three of Superman & Lois, Clark and Lois are enjoying small town life. However, Lois' undercover assignment reveals a deadly foe that promises to change the Kent family forever.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S12 23
programme.desc: Everything changes as Sheldon and Amy await big news in the first of a two-part series finale.

programme.desc: A search for Rick Tyler (CAMERON GELLMAN) leads Courtney, Yolanda and Beth Chapel (ANJELIKA WASHINGTON) to Cindy Burman's (MEG DeLACY) Halloween party.

programme.title: DC's Stargirl S1 6
programme.desc: After Pat confronts Courtney about the potential consequences of recruiting new JSA members, Courtney makes a difficult decision and the JSA prepare for their first mission.

programme.title: DC's Stargirl S1 7
programme.desc: As Pat teaches Courtney, Yolanda, Beth and Rick the importance of teamwork, the ISA converge to figure out who is trying to take them down.

programme.title: DC's Stargirl S1 8
programme.desc: After Courtney gets herself into some trouble, Pat decides they need to come clean to Barbara. Meanwhile, Yolanda, Beth and Rick lead an investigation into a classmate.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S15 5
programme.desc: You have the right to remain stupid! TruTV brings you 20 of the dumbest outlaws ever to fight the law and lose.
